Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.board

Class Cell

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.board.Cell
public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
This Class is ued to represent the Cells on the board.
Author:
giorgio

    • getTopNotNull

      private Placeable getTopNotNull()
      Method that does the same things of the getTop() but doesn't return null. If it doesn't exist it returns a new Placeable
      Returns:
      (The Placeable on top of the building on the Cell, else a new placeable)

    • isDomed

      public boolean isDomed()
      Method that returns true iif there is a Dome on this Cell
      Returns:
      (Is there a Dome on this Cell? true:false)

    • isOccupied

      public boolean isOccupied()
      Method that checks if there is a worker on this Cell
      Returns:
      (is there a Worker on this? true:false)

    • isFree

      public boolean isFree()
      Method that checks if there isn't a worker or a Dome on this Cell
      Returns:
      (Is there a Dome or a Worker on it? false: true)

    • removePlaceable

      public boolean removePlaceable()
      Method that eliminate the Placeable on the top of the building
      Returns:
      (did it remove the top Placeable? true: false)

    • removePlaceable

      public boolean removePlaceable​(int level)
      Method that removes the level of the building on this Cell.
      Parameters:
      level - (the level of the building to be removed)
      Returns:
      (true iif it has succesfully removed the Placeable on level)

    • placeOn

      public boolean placeOn​(Placeable placeable)
      Method that puts on the top of the building of this Cell the passed Placeable. It also checks weather it's possible or not doing so.
      Parameters:
      placeable - (the placeable to be put on the top of the building)
      Returns:
      (true iif placeable can be put on the top of this Cell)

    • buildBlock

      public boolean buildBlock()
      Method intended to be used to build blocks on the Cell. This is useful because it adds Blocks from the bottom of the constructionn, so it can be usefut, for example, for Zeus.
      Returns:
      true iif it has built the block on the Cell.

    • canBuildBlock

      public boolean canBuildBlock()
      Method intended to check weather the building of a block on this Cell brings this Cell to an unconsistent state.
      Returns:
      true iif it can build the block on the Cell.

    • canBuildDome

      public boolean canBuildDome()
      Method intended to check weather the building of a dome on this Cell brings this Cell to an unconsistent state.
      Returns:
      true iif it can build the dome on the Cell.

    • buildDome

      public boolean buildDome()
      Method intended to build the Dome on this.builidng
      Returns:
      true iif it has bilt the Dome on this.building

      (the actual status)

      public boolean place​(PlaceableType placeableType)
      Given a type of Placeable, place it onto the Cell.
